pli-tv-pvr2.14:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.14:1.2: They are legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of asking for curd and then eating it, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.14:2.2: They are legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr2.14:3.1: The sixth section on legal issues is finished.
